attrUUID(address,uint256).details: Generates an identifier which associates a user and a poll together

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

returns._0: UUID Hash which is deterministic from _user and _pollID

commitPeriodActive(uint256).details: Checks isExpired for the specified poll's commitEndDate

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

returns._0: Boolean indication of isCommitPeriodActive for target poll

params._numTokens: The number of tokens to be committed towards the target poll
params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._prevPollID: The ID of the poll that the user has voted the maximum number of tokens in which is still less than or equal to numTokens
params._secretHash: Commit keccak256 hash of voter's choice and salt (tightly packed in this order)

params._numsTokens: Array of numbers of tokens to be committed towards the target polls
params._pollIDs: Array of integer identifiers associated with target polls
params._prevPollIDs: Array of IDs of the polls that the user has voted the maximum number of tokens in which is still less than or equal to numTokens
params._secretHashes: Array of commit keccak256 hashes of voter's choices and salts (tightly packed in this order)

getCommitHash(address,uint256).details: Gets the bytes32 commitHash property of target poll

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._voter: Address of user to check against

returns._0: Bytes32 hash property attached to target poll

getInsertPointForNumTokens(address,uint2.details: Takes the last node in the user's DLL and iterates backwards through the list searching for a node with a value less than or equal to the provided _numTokens value. When such a node is found, if the provided _pollID matches the found nodeID, this operation is an in-place update. In that case, return the previous node of the node being updated. Otherwise return the first node that was found with a value less than or equal to the provided _numTokens.

params._numTokens: The value for the numTokens attribute in the node to be inserted
params._voter: The voter whose DLL will be searched

returns._0: the node which the propoded node should be inserted after

getLastNode(address).details: Gets top element of sorted poll-linked-list

params._voter: Address of user to check against

returns._0: Integer identifier to poll with maximum number of tokens committed to it

getLockedTokens(address).details: Gets the numTokens property of getLastNode

params._voter: Address of user to check against

returns._0: Maximum number of tokens committed in poll specified

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._voter: Address of user to check against

returns._0: Number of tokens committed to poll in sorted poll-linked-list

getTotalNumberOfTokensForWinningOption(u.details: Gets the total winning votes for reward distribution purposes

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

returns._0: Total number of votes committed to the winning option for specified poll

isExpired(uint256).details: Checks if an expiration date has been reached

params._terminationDate: Integer timestamp of date to compare current timestamp with

returns._0: expired Boolean indication of whether the terminationDate has passed

isPassed(uint256).details: Check if votesFor out of totalVotes exceeds votesQuorum (requires pollEnded)

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

pollEnded(uint256).details: Checks isExpired for specified poll's revealEndDate

returns._0: Boolean indication of whether polling period is over

params._pollID: The pollID whose existance is to be evaluated.

returns._0: Boolean Indicates whether a poll exists for the provided pollID

requestVotingRights(uint256).details: Assumes that msg.sender has approved voting contract to spend on their behalf

params.amount: The number of votingTokens desired in exchange for ERC20 tokens

rescueTokens(uint256).details: Unlocks tokens locked in unrevealed vote where poll has ended

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with the target poll

rescueTokensInMultiplePolls(uint256[]).details: Unlocks tokens locked in unrevealed votes where polls have ended

params._pollIDs: Array of integer identifiers associated with the target polls

revealPeriodActive(uint256).details: Checks isExpired for the specified poll's revealEndDate

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._salt: Secret number used to generate commitHash for associated poll
params._voteOption: Vote choice used to generate commitHash for associated poll

params._pollIDs: Array of integer identifiers associated with target polls
params._salts: Array of secret numbers used to generate commitHashes for associated polls
params._voteOptions: Array of vote choices used to generate commitHashes for associated polls

validPosition(uint256,uint256,address,ui.details: Compares previous and next poll's committed tokens for sorting purposes

params._nextID: Integer identifier associated with next poll in sorted order
params._numTokens: The number of tokens to be committed towards the poll (used for sorting)
params._prevID: Integer identifier associated with previous poll in sorted order
params._voter: Address of user to check DLL position for

returns._0: valid Boolean indication of if the specified position maintains the sort

params.amount: The number of ERC20 tokens desired in exchange for voting rights

commitPeriodActive(uint256).notice: Checks if the commit period is still active for the specified poll

commitVote(uint256,bytes32,uint256,uint2.notice: Commits vote using hash of choice and secret salt to conceal vote until reveal

commitVotes(uint256[],bytes32[],uint256[.notice: Commits votes using hashes of choices and secret salts to conceal votes until reveal

requestVotingRights(uint256).notice: Loads amount ERC20 tokens into the voting contract for one-to-one voting rights

revealPeriodActive(uint256).notice: Checks if the reveal period is still active for the specified poll

revealVote(uint256,uint8,uint256).notice: Reveals vote with choice and secret salt used in generating commitHash to attribute committed tokens

revealVotes(uint256[],uint8[],uint256[]).notice: Reveals multiple votes with choices and secret salts used in generating commitHashes to attribute committed tokens

withdrawVotingRights(uint256).notice: Withdraw amount ERC20 tokens from the voting contract, revoking these voting rights
